languages.text: "Значит, {name} внимательнее к своим подданным, чем была Леди Теодора. Печально, что это тебя удивляет, а не радует".
"All it means is that {mf|he|she} is more attentive to {mf|his|her} subjects than Lady Theodora ever was. It is unfortunate that you should find this surprising rather than heartening."
languages.original_text: "Значит, {name} внимательнее к своим подданным, чем была Леди Теодора. Печально, что это тебя удивляет, а не радует".

traits.locale_text: "All it means is that {mf|he|she} is more attentive to {mf|his|her} subjects than Lady Theodora ever was. It is unfortunate that you find this surprising rather than heartening."
"All it means is that {mf|he|she} is more attentive to {mf|his|her} subjects than Lady Theodora ever was. It is unfortunate that you find this surprising rather than heartening."
"All it means is that {mf|he|she} is more attentive to {mf|his|her} subjects than Lady Theodora ever was to hers. It is unfortunate that you should find this surprising rather than heartening."
"All it means is that {mf|he|she} is more attentive to {mf|his|her} subjects than Lady Theodora ever was to hers. It is unfortunate that you should find this surprising rather than heartening."

"All it means is that {mf|he|she} is more attentive to {mf|his|her} subjects than Lady Theodora ever was. It is unfortunate that you should find this surprising rather than heartening."
"All it means is that {mf|he|she} is more attentive to {mf|his|her} subjects than Lady Theodora ever was. It is unfortunate that you should find this surprising rather than heartening."

languages.text: "Das heißt nur, dass {mf|er|sie} sich stärker für {mf|seine|ihre} Untertanen interessiert, als Lady Theodora es je getan hat. Es ist bedauerlich, dass Ihr das überraschend findet und nicht ermutigend."
languages.original_text: "All it means is that {mf|he|she} is more attentive to {mf|his|her} subjects than Lady Theodora ever was. It is unfortunate that you should find this surprising rather than heartening."

traits.locale_text: "Das heißt nur, dass {mf|er|sie} sich stärker für {mf|seine|ihre} Untertanen interessiert, als Lady Theodora es je getan hat. Es ist bedauerlich, dass Ihr das überraschend findet und nicht ermutigend."

languages.text: « Cela signifie simplement qu'{mf|il|elle} est plus {mf|attentif|attentive} à ses sujets que dame Théodora l'a jamais été. Dommage que cela vous inspire davantage de surprise que de réconfort. »
languages.original_text: "All it means is that {mf|he|she} is more attentive to {mf|his|her} subjects than Lady Theodora ever was. It is unfortunate that you should find this surprising rather than heartening."

traits.locale_text: « Cela signifie simplement qu'{mf|il|elle} est plus {mf|attentif|attentive} à ses sujets que dame Théodora l'a jamais été. Dommage que cela vous inspire davantage de surprise que de réconfort. »

languages.text: «Esto solo significa que es más atent{mf|o|a} para con sus súbditos que lo que lady Theodora llegó a ser. Es una lástima que le resulte sorprendente y no reconfortante».
languages.original_text: "All it means is that {mf|he|she} is more attentive to {mf|his|her} subjects than Lady Theodora ever was. It is unfortunate that you should find this surprising rather than heartening."

traits.locale_text: «Esto solo significa que es más atent{mf|o|a} para con sus súbditos que lo que lady Theodora llegó a ser. Es una lástima que le resulte sorprendente y no reconfortante».

languages.text: 「つまり、{mf|彼|彼女}は{mf|彼|彼女}の臣下に対して、シオドーラ様以上に気を配っているということ。残念だけど、あなたにとってこの事実は心強いというより、むしろ驚くべき事実ね」
languages.original_text: "All it means is that {mf|he|she} is more attentive to {mf|his|her} subjects than Lady Theodora ever was. It is unfortunate that you should find this surprising rather than heartening."

traits.locale_text: 「つまり、{mf|彼|彼女}は{mf|彼|彼女}の臣下に対して、シオドーラ様以上に気を配っているということ。残念だけど、あなたにとってこの事実は心強いというより、むしろ驚くべき事実ね」

languages.text: “这意味着我们的舰长大人比西奥多拉夫人更关心{mf|他|她}的臣民。这本来是件鼓舞人心的事情，但遗憾的是，你感到的却是震惊。”
languages.original_text: "All it means is that {mf|he|she} is more attentive to {mf|his|her} subjects than Lady Theodora ever was. It is unfortunate that you should find this surprising rather than heartening."

traits.locale_text: “这意味着我们的舰长大人比西奥多拉夫人更关心{mf|他|她}的臣民。这本来是件鼓舞人心的事情，但遗憾的是，你感到的却是震惊。”

languages.original_text: "All it means is that {mf|he|she} is more attentive to {mf|his|her} subjects than Lady Theodora ever was. It is unfortunate that you should find this surprising rather than heartening."

languages.text: "Tüm bunlardan {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri'nin tebaasına karşı Leydi Theodora'nın hiç göstermediği kadar ilgili olduğu anlamı çıkıyor. Bunun içini rahatlatmasından ziyade seni şaşırtması üzücü."
languages.original_text: "All it means is that {mf|he|she} is more attentive to {mf|his|her} subjects than Lady Theodora ever was. It is unfortunate that you should find this surprising rather than heartening."
